mapper.sql: info.ID, info.KZID, info.STATUSID, info.APPOINTORID, info.COLLECTORID, info.COMPANYID, info.SOURCEID
mapper.select: SELECT , (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) - info.LASTPUSHTIME) PUSHINTERVAL ,info.SRCTYPE SRCTYPE FROM ${infoTabName} info LEFT JOIN ${detailTabName} det ON det.KZID = info.KZID AND info.COMPANYID = det.COMPANYID WHERE info.ISDEL = 0 AND info.KZID = #{kzId};

SELECT info.ID, info.KZID, info.KZNAME, info.KZPHONE, info.KZWECHAT, info.KZWW, info.KZQQ, det.MEMO, info.APPOINTORID, info.COLLECTORID, info.PROMOTORID, info.COMPANYID, info.SOURCEID, det.APPOINTNAME, det.FILMINGAREA, src.SRCNAME, src.CHANNELNAME, det.INVALIDLABEL, info.SUCCESSTIME, det.AMOUNT, info.CREATETIME, det.COLLECTORNAME, det.SHOPNAME, det.RECEPTORNAME, det.AMOUNT, det.STAYAMOUNT, info.LASTPUSHTIME FROM ${infoTabName} info LEFT JOIN ${detailTabName} det ON det.KZID = info.KZID AND info.COMPANYID = det.COMPANYID LEFT JOIN hm_crm_source src ON src.COMPANYID = info.COMPANYID AND src.ID = info.SOURCEID WHERE info.KZID = #{kzId};

SELECT info.KZID, info.COMPANYID, info.TYPEID, info.CHANNELID, info.SOURCEID, src.PUSHRULE, src.TYPEID SRCTYPE FROM ${infoTabName} info LEFT JOIN hm_crm_source src ON info.SOURCEID = src.ID AND src.COMPANYID = #{companyId} WHERE info.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND ( info.STATUSID = 999 OR info.STATUSID = 12 ) AND ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) - info.LASTPUSHTIME ) >= #{overTime}
AND ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) - info.CREATETIME ) <= 2592000 ORDER BY info.ID ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ${infoTabName} info WHERE info.SHOPID = #{shopId} AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND info.COMPANYID = #{companyId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ${detailName} det WHERE det.FILMINGCODE = #{filmingCode} AND det.ISDEL = 0 AND det.COMPANYID = #{companyId}

SELECT info.ID, info.KZID, info.COMPANYID FROM ${infoTabName} info WHERE info.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND info.ISDEL = 0 -- AND info.STATUSID != 98 -- AND info.STATUSID != 99 -- AND info.STATUSID != 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', #{kzIds}, ','), CONCAT(',', info.KZID, ',')) != 0;

SELECT info.ID, info.KZID, info.COMPANYID, info.STATUSID FROM ${infoTabName} info WHERE info.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', #{kzIds}, ','), CONCAT(',', info.KZID, ',')) != 0;

SELECT log.ID id, info.KZID kzId, info.KZNAME kzName, info.KZPHONE kzPhone, FROM_UNIXTIME(log.OPERATIME, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s ') createTime, info.KZQQ kzqq, info.KZWECHAT kzWechat, detail.APPOINTNAME appointName FROM ${tableLog} log LEFT JOIN ${tableInfo} info ON info.KZID = log.KZID LEFT JOIN ${tableDetail} detail ON log.KZID = detail.KZID WHERE log.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND log.LOGTYPE = #{logType}
AND log.OPERATIME >= #{startTime} AND log.OPERATIME < #{endTime}

SELECT info.ID, info.KZID, info.COMPANYID FROM ${infoTabName} info WHERE info.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND info.STATUSID = 3 AND info.CLASSID = 3 AND INSTR(#{kzIds}, info.KZID) != 0;

SELECT info.KZID, info.SRCTYPE FROM ${infoTabName} info WHERE info.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND info.STATUSID = 0 AND info.PROMOTORID IS NULL AND (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) - info.LASTPUSHTIME) >= #{overTime} ORDER BY info.ID ASC
SELECT COUNT(info.ID) FROM ${infoTabName} info WHERE info.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', #{kzIds}, ','), CONCAT(',', info.KZID, ',')) != 0 AND ${type} IS NOT NULL
